## Learning Objectives

-   Install R and RStudio\
-   Navigate the RStudio interface\
-   Understand the console vs script vs environment\
-   Run simple R code and inspect datasets

## Key Concepts

-   RStudio panes: Source, Console, Environment, Files\
-   Script vs interactive console\
-   Basic data types (`numeric`, `character`, `logical`) and vectors\
-   Using `dput()` for reproducible sharing (R4DS Intro) :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index="1"}
